org.gephi.ranking.api.Interpolator

    Package Description
    org.gephi.ranking.api
    Ranking API

    • Uses of Interpolator in org.gephi.ranking.api

      Subclasses of Interpolator in org.gephi.ranking.api 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Interpolator.BezierInterpolator
      Bezier curve interpolator.
      Fields in org.gephi.ranking.api declared as Interpolator 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Interpolator Interpolator.LINEAR
      Linear interpolation x = interpolate(x)
      static Interpolator Interpolator.LOG2
      Log2 interpolation Math.log(1 + x)/Math.log(2) = interpolate(x)
      Methods in org.gephi.ranking.api that return Interpolator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interpolator RankingModel.getInterpolator()
      Returns the current interpolator.
      static Interpolator Interpolator.newBezierInterpolator(float px1, float py1, float px2, float py2)
      Builds a bezier interpolator with two control points (px1, py1) and (px2, py2).
      Methods in org.gephi.ranking.api with parameters of type Interpolator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RankingController.setInterpolator(Interpolator interpolator)
      Sets the interpolator to be used when transforming values.
